pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 1, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Gatineau, Quebec

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Israel, Reuven Rivlin.

Willson House
Meech Lake, Gatineau Park

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.

Ottawa, Ontario  

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a luncheon in honour of the President of Israel and will deliver opening remarks.

Trillium Ballroom, Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks
  • Media are asked to present themselves in room 107 of the Shaw Centre no later than 12:15 p.m.

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a wreath-laying ceremony at the National Holocaust Monument with the President of Israel.

National Holocaust Monument
1918 Chaudière Crossing

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will attend a State Dinner given by Her Excellency the Right Honourable Julie Payette, Governor General of Canada, in honour of the President of Israel.

Tent Room, Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage at the beginning of the dinner
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:00 p.m.
